pageAction: let imgs=document.querySelectorAll(".scale-img[style*='_w360']");[].forEach.call(imgs,div=>{let s=div.getAttribute('style');let sm=s.match(/_w360/);let o=s.replace('_w360','');if(sm){div.style=o}});setTimeout(()=>{let ls=document.querySelectorAll('.page-num-list li:not([class])');let ll=location.pathname;[].forEach.call(ls,li=>{let p=li.innerText;let llp=ll+'?page='+p;let ps='location.replace('+`'` + llp + `'`+')';li.setAttribute('onclick',ps);});let h=document.querySelector('.page-list>li:nth-child(1)');let gohp='location.replace('+`'` + ll + `'`+')';h.setAttribute('onclick',gohp);let n=document.querySelector('.page-list>li:nth-child(2)');let np=document.querySelector('.cur-page+li');if(n&&np){let nll=ll+'?page='+np.innerText;let next='location.replace('+`'` + nll + `'`+')';n.setAttribute('onclick',next);}else{n.removeAttribute('onclick')}},500)

name: bt1207
nextLinkByJs: let n=doc.querySelector('ul.pagination>li.active+li>a');if(!n)return null;let params=[]; let form=doc.querySelector('#search-form'); [].forEach.call(form.querySelectorAll('input'), input=>{ if(input.name=='p')params.push('p='+n.innerText);else params.push(input.name+'='+input.value); }); return form.action+'?'+params.join('&');

pageAction: setTimeout(()=>{let as=document.querySelectorAll('a.waves-effect:not([title])');let ls=location.search.replace(/&page_id=\d+/,'');[].forEach.call(as,a=>{let p=a.innerText;let ap=ls+'&page_id='+p;a.href=ap;a.removeAttribute('onclick')});let fp=document.querySelector("a[title='First Page']");fp.href=ls;fp.removeAttribute('onclick');let cp=document.querySelector("li.active>a").innerText;let app=document.querySelector("a[title='Previous Page']");if(app!=null){let pp=cp-1;app.href=ls+'&page_id='+pp;app.removeAttribute('onclick')}let np=document.querySelector("li.active+li>a").innerText;let anp=document.querySelector("a[title='Next Page']");if(anp!=null){anp.href=ls+'&page_id='+np;anp.removeAttribute('onclick')}let lp=document.querySelector('.showing_pages').innerText;let match=lp.match(/of (\d+)/);let alp=document.querySelector("a[title='Last Page']");alp.href=ls+'&page_id='+match[1];alp.removeAttribute('onclick')},1000)

name: avple.tv - 類別
author: tony0809
pageAction: let imgs=document.querySelectorAll('img.jss29');[].forEach.call(imgs,img=>{img.setAttribute('class','jss28')});setTimeout(()=>{let bs=document.querySelectorAll("button[aria-label^='Go to page']");let pp=document.querySelector("button[aria-label='Go to previous page']:not(.Mui-disabled)");let cp=document.querySelector('button.Mui-selected');let np=document.querySelector("button[aria-label='Go to next page']:not(.Mui-disabled)");let lp=location.pathname;let lps=lp.split('/');let cpn=cp.innerHTML.match(/^(\d+)/)[1];let npn=cp.parentNode.nextSibling.firstChild.innerHTML.match(/^(\d+)/)[1];[].forEach.call(bs,button=>{let pn=button.innerHTML.match(/^(\d+)/);let link='/'+lps[1]+'/'+lps[2]+'/'+pn[1]+'/'+lps[4];let lr='location.replace('+`'` + link + `'`+')';button.setAttribute('onclick',lr)});if(pp){let p=cpn-1;let link='/'+lps[1]+'/'+lps[2]+'/'+p+'/'+lps[4];let lr='location.replace('+`'` + link + `'`+')';pp.setAttribute('onclick',lr)}if(np){let link='/'+lps[1]+'/'+lps[2]+'/'+npn+'/'+lps[4];let lr='location.replace('+`'` + link + `'`+')';np.setAttribute('onclick',lr)}},1000)

name: avple.tv - 搜索
author: tony0809
pageAction: let imgs=document.querySelectorAll('img.jss29');[].forEach.call(imgs,img=>{img.setAttribute('class','jss28')});setTimeout(()=>{let bs=document.querySelectorAll(`button[aria-label^='Go to page']`);let pp=document.querySelector(`button[aria-label='Go to previous page']:not(.Mui-disabled)`);let cp=document.querySelector('button.Mui-selected');let np=document.querySelector(`button[aria-label='Go to next page']:not(.Mui-disabled)`);let ls=location.search;let m=ls.match(/^(\?key=)([^&]+)(&page=)(\d+)(&sort=date|&sort=view_count|&sort=favorite)/);let cpn=cp.innerHTML.match(/^(\d+)/)[1];let npn=cp.parentNode.nextSibling.firstChild.innerHTML.match(/^(\d+)/)[1];[].forEach.call(bs,button=>{let pn=button.innerHTML.match(/^(\d+)/)[1];let link=m[1]+m[2]+m[3]+pn+m[5];let lr='location.replace('+`'` + link + `'`+')';button.setAttribute('onclick',lr)});if(pp){let p=cpn-1;let link=m[1]+m[2]+m[3]+p+m[5];let lr='location.replace('+`'` + link + `'`+')';pp.setAttribute('onclick',lr)}if(np){let link=m[1]+m[2]+m[3]+npn+m[5];let lr='location.replace('+`'` + link + `'`+')';np.setAttribute('onclick',lr)}},1000)
